name: Crispy Fried Chicken Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Crispy Fried Chicken Recipe: Chicken (With skin) 1 Eggs 4 Oil for frying White Vinegar 1 cup Red Chili Powder 1 tbsp Gulzarâs Special Broast Masala 2 cup Salt to taste
instructions: Take a mixing bowl add 1 cup of white vinegar, 1 tbsp of red chili powder, mix it well and make a marination. Now cut the chicken into 12 slices (cut very carefully ) then marinade the chicken pieces for ½ an hour. Take anpther mixing bowl add 4 eggs beat it and dip the chicken pieces then coat the gulzarâs special broast masala. Then deep fry the chicken. Now crispy fried chicken is ready.
